definition: near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: It's an important development to apply magnetic field to hydrocyclones.
sentences.chinese: 把磁场应用于水力旋流器是近期研究的一个重要发展。

sentences.english: Other factors will affect near-term employment growth as well.
sentences.chinese: 其他因素也会对近期的就业增长产生影响。

sentences.english: The concept of cultural diasporic has been introduced to translation study recently.
sentences.chinese: 文化离散是近期在翻译界提出的新概念。

sentences.english: 'I don't see any room for its share price to rise soon, ' says Mr. Yao.
sentences.chinese: 姚宏光说，他认为该股股价近期难有上升空间。

sentences.english: A recent survey from the Annals of Internal Medicine bears this out.
sentences.chinese: 《内科学年会》的一个近期的调查报道了这个问题。

sentences.english: The price of thread steel has been increasing recently.
sentences.chinese: 近期螺纹钢的价格持续上涨。

sentences.english: Some analysts have suggested recently that a Delta-Northwest combination may be possible.
sentences.chinese: 近期有分析家预测，达美航空可能与西南航空合并。

sentences.english: Palin has recently struggled to give clear answers in some highly- publicized interviews .
sentences.chinese: 培林近期在一些高度宣传访谈中努力提出明确的答案。

sentences.english: Pyongyang has recent withdrawn two mid-range missiles which had been poised far on the country's east coast.
sentences.chinese: 平壤近期撤走了位于东海岸的两枚中程导弹。

sentences.english: The key battleground in the near term is mobile computing.
sentences.chinese: 双方近期的主战场是移动计算。

sentences.english: Conclusion Clinical investigation was satisfactory recently at immediate restoration of single implant crown.
sentences.chinese: 结论单牙即刘修复近期临床观察效果满意。

sentences.english: Cheng. He expects a shortage of TBR tires won't end any time soon.
sentences.chinese: 他预计TBR轮胎短缺的局面近期内不会结束。

sentences.english: And there has been a recent crackdown on the corrupt nexus between developers and officials.
sentences.chinese: 近期政府又打击了一起官商勾结的腐败问题。

sentences.english: The drought also posed a threat to the immediate future of thousands of smallholder farmers.
sentences.chinese: 干旱还威胁着成千上万小农近期的生计。

sentences.english: The overall technical backdrop remains bullish and favors another attempt to rally toward recent high.
sentences.chinese: 总体技术面仍看涨，支持再次向近期高点上攻。

sentences.english: The super transport ministry has been established in the super ministry reform of the State Council recently.
sentences.chinese: 近期国务院实行了大部制改革，成立了大交通部。

definition: in the past few days/recently/in the last few days
the person himself/I (humble form used in speeches)/oneself/myself/in person/personal
